main event: A bright yellowish object, larger than a meteor, was observed falling straight to the earth in Eugene, Oregon.
interesting points: The observation was made using ground radar and visual methods., The sighting lasted for a very brief period of time., The object disappeared into the horizon after being seen., It was concluded that the object was probably a meteor, but there was insufficient data for evaluation., The report was part of Project Blue Book and involved communication with military intelligence.
sighted object: a yellowish object larger than a meteor
